note: howdy! you like robots? how about OCs? well, I love both!! I've got way more of 'em than I know what to do with.

fields.name: hyperfixations
fields.value: Transformers, Destiny, Warframe, pretty much just any kind of non-human robots (androids invalid), shiny objects, tamatoa, invertabrates (most notably cephalopods, gastropods, crustaceans, and insects), and good food but only if I'm able to eat it.

fields.name: robots?
fields.value: yes, in case that wasn't clear
